page.title: 15Brussels disaster
page.content: On Wendnesday 29th May 1985 Liverpool were playing Juventus for the European cup final. 30 mins before the match, Liverpool supporters broke out of their stands delaying the kick off by 1 hour. The Liverpool supporters that had been mixing with Juventus supporters, started rioting, some supporters started climbing a six foot wall in an effort to escape, in doing so they brought the wall down on them, bring the final death total to 38 dead many more were injured. As a punisment all English Clubs are banned from playing abroad. This ban does not include the International team because of this Joe Fagan retired from Liverpool, Kenny Dalglish has taken his place. Violance behavior at football matches seems to be increasing.
